WDY_COMPONENTT.DESCRIPTION: Main password reset screen for user

WDY_CTLR_COMPO.CODE_BODY:
METHOD send_email_to_user .
DATA: lv_send_result TYPE c,
lo_sender TYPE REF TO if_sender_bcs, lo_receiver TYPE REF TO if_recipient_bcs,
lo_email TYPE REF TO cl_bcs, lo_email_body TYPE REF TO cl_document_bcs,
lx_exception TYPE REF TO cx_bcs.
TRY. lo_email = cl_bcs=>create_persistent( ).
lo_email_body = cl_document_bcs=>create_document( i_type = 'RAW' i_text = im_t_body i_subject = im_v_subject ).
lo_email->set_document( lo_email_body ).
lo_sender = cl_cam_address_bcs=>create_internet_address( im_v_sender ).
lo_receiver = cl_cam_address_bcs=>create_internet_address( im_v_receiver ). lo_email->add_recipient( i_recipient = lo_receiver i_express = 'X' ).
lo_email->set_sender( i_sender = lo_sender ).
lo_email->set_send_immediately( 'X' ).
lo_email->send( EXPORTING i_with_error_screen = 'X' RECEIVING result = lv_send_result ).
ex_send_result = lv_send_result.
COMMIT WORK.
CATCH cx_bcs INTO lx_exception.
ENDTRY.
ENDMETHOD.

METHOD set_auth_key .
DATA ls_line TYPE zbc_reset_pwd. DATA lv_uname TYPE xubname.
lv_uname = username. SET LOCALE LANGUAGE 'E'. TRANSLATE lv_uname TO UPPER CASE. SET LOCALE LANGUAGE ' '. SELECT SINGLE * INTO ls_line FROM zbc_reset_pwd WHERE authdate EQ sy-datum AND uname EQ lv_uname.
IF sy-subrc = 0. "Record already exist uuid = ls_line-uuid. ELSE. "Record not exist; Create record and UUID ls_line-uname = lv_uname. CALL FUNCTION 'SYSTEM_UUID_C_CREATE' IMPORTING uuid = ls_line-uuid. IF ls_line-uuid IS INITIAL. ENDIF.
ls_line-authdate = sy-datum. MODIFY zbc_reset_pwd FROM ls_line.
IF sy-subrc <> 0. ELSE. uuid = ls_line-uuid. ENDIF.
ENDIF.
ENDMETHOD.

METHOD wddoinit .
DATA lo_nd_confirmation TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA lo_el_confirmation TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_element. DATA ls_confirmation TYPE wd_this->element_confirmation.
* navigate from <CONTEXT> to <CONFIRMATION> via lead selection lo_nd_confirmation = wd_context->get_child_node( name = wd_this->wdctx_confirmation ).
DATA lo_nd_labels TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA lo_el_labels TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_element. DATA ls_labels TYPE wd_this->element_labels.
* navigate from <CONTEXT> to <LABELS> via lead selection lo_nd_labels = wd_context->get_child_node( name = wd_this->wdctx_labels ).
* @TODO handle non existant child * IF lo_nd_confirmation IS INITIAL. * ENDIF.
* get element via lead selection lo_el_confirmation = lo_nd_confirmation->get_element( ).
* @TODO handle not set lead selection IF lo_el_confirmation IS INITIAL. ENDIF.
* @TODO fill static attributes * ls_confirmation = xxx->get_yyy( ).
MESSAGE s000(zbc_reset_password) INTO ls_confirmation-message1. * Your request was successfully submitted. MESSAGE s001(zbc_reset_password) INTO ls_confirmation-message2. * Please check your email for a reset link. MESSAGE s002(zbc_reset_password) INTO ls_confirmation-message3. * Thank You!
* set all declared attributes lo_el_confirmation->set_static_attributes( static_attributes = ls_confirmation ).
* @TODO handle non existant child * IF lo_nd_labels IS INITIAL. * ENDIF.
* get element via lead selection lo_el_labels = lo_nd_labels->get_element( ).
* @TODO handle not set lead selection IF lo_el_labels IS INITIAL. ENDIF.
* @TODO fill static attributes * ls_labels = xxx->get_yyy( ).
MESSAGE s012(zbc_reset_password) INTO ls_labels-submit. * Submit MESSAGE s013(zbc_reset_password) INTO ls_labels-header_main_view. * Password Reset MESSAGE s014(zbc_reset_password) INTO ls_labels-header_confirmation_view. * Password Reset Confirmation
* set all declared attributes lo_el_labels->set_static_attributes( static_attributes = ls_labels ).
ENDMETHOD.

method WDDOBEFOREACTION . * data lo_api_controller type ref to if_wd_view_controller. * data lo_action type ref to if_wd_action.
* lo_api_controller = wd_this->wd_get_api( ). * lo_action = lo_api_controller->get_current_action( ).
* if lo_action is bound. * case lo_action->name. * when '...'.
* endcase. * endif. endmethod.

METHOD onactionsubmit .
DATA lo_api_controller TYPE REF TO if_wd_controller. DATA lo_message_manager TYPE REF TO if_wd_message_manager. DATA lo_componentcontroller TYPE REF TO ig_componentcontroller . DATA lo_nd_user TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node. DATA lo_el_user TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_element.
DATA lt_match_result_tab TYPE match_result_tab. DATA lt_body TYPE bcsy_text.
DATA ls_match_result TYPE match_result. DATA ls_line LIKE LINE OF lt_body. DATA ls_line2 LIKE LINE OF lt_body. DATA ls_usr21 TYPE usr21. DATA ls_adr6 TYPE adr6. DATA ls_user TYPE wd_this->element_user.
DATA lv_full_name TYPE adrp-name_text. DATA lv_subject TYPE so_obj_des. DATA lv_sender TYPE ad_smtpadr. DATA lv_receiver TYPE ad_smtpadr. DATA lv_send_result TYPE c. DATA lv_uuid TYPE sysuuid_c. DATA lv_msgid TYPE string. DATA lv_message_text TYPE string. DATA lv_url TYPE string.
* lo_componentcontroller = wd_this->get_componentcontroller_ctr( ).
* get message manager lo_api_controller ?= wd_this->wd_get_api( ). CALL METHOD lo_api_controller->get_message_manager RECEIVING message_manager = lo_message_manager.
* navigate from <CONTEXT> to <USER> via lead selection lo_nd_user = wd_context->get_child_node( name = wd_this->wdctx_user ).
* @TODO handle non existant child * IF lo_nd_user IS INITIAL. * ENDIF.
* get element via lead selection lo_el_user = lo_nd_user->get_element( ). * @TODO handle not set lead selection IF lo_el_user IS INITIAL. ENDIF.
* get all declared attributes lo_el_user->get_static_attributes( IMPORTING static_attributes = ls_user ).
IF ls_user-username IS INITIAL OR ls_user-email IS INITIAL.
MESSAGE e003(zbc_reset_password) INTO lv_message_text. * Please enter a valid value in each field!
* report message CALL METHOD lo_message_manager->report_error_message EXPORTING message_text = lv_message_text RECEIVING message_id = lv_msgid.
ELSE. TRANSLATE ls_user-username TO UPPER CASE. SELECT SINGLE * FROM usr21 INTO ls_usr21 WHERE bname EQ ls_user-username. IF sy-subrc EQ 0. SELECT * FROM adr6 INTO ls_adr6 WHERE addrnumber EQ ls_usr21-addrnumber AND persnumber EQ ls_usr21-persnumber AND date_from LE sy-datum ORDER BY date_from DESCENDING. EXIT. ENDSELECT. IF sy-subrc EQ 0. TRANSLATE ls_user-email TO UPPER CASE. TRANSLATE ls_adr6-smtp_addr TO UPPER CASE.
IF ls_user-email EQ ls_adr6-smtp_addr.
lv_uuid = lo_componentcontroller->set_auth_key( username = ls_user-username ).
SELECT SINGLE name_text FROM adrp INTO lv_full_name WHERE persnumber EQ ls_usr21-persnumber.
MESSAGE s007(zbc_reset_password) INTO ls_line. * Dear CONCATENATE ls_line lv_full_name INTO ls_line SEPARATED BY space. CONCATENATE ls_line ',' INTO ls_line. APPEND ls_line TO lt_body.
CLEAR ls_line. APPEND ls_line TO lt_body.
CLEAR: ls_line, ls_line2. MESSAGE s008(zbc_reset_password) INTO ls_line2. * You have requested to reset your password. MESSAGE s009(zbc_reset_password) INTO ls_line. * Click the link below to reset your password. CONCATENATE ls_line2 ' ' ls_line2 INTO ls_line RESPECTING BLANKS. APPEND ls_line TO lt_body.
CLEAR ls_line. APPEND ls_line TO lt_body.
CALL METHOD cl_wd_utilities=>construct_wd_url EXPORTING application_name = 'ZBC_A_PWD_RESET_MD' IMPORTING out_absolute_url = lv_url.
FIND ALL OCCURRENCES OF '/' IN lv_url RESULTS lt_match_result_tab. READ TABLE lt_match_result_tab INTO ls_match_result INDEX 3.
CASE sy-sysid. WHEN 'A4H'. CONCATENATE 'https://vhcala4hci:50001' lv_url+ls_match_result-offset INTO lv_url. WHEN 'NPL'. CONCATENATE 'https://vhcalnplci:44300' lv_url+ls_match_result-offset INTO lv_url. WHEN 'DEV'. CONCATENATE 'https://sapdev.medavie.bluecross.ca' lv_url+ls_match_result-offset INTO lv_url. WHEN 'QEV'. CONCATENATE 'https://sapqa.medavie.bluecross.ca' lv_url+ls_match_result-offset INTO lv_url. WHEN 'PEV'. CONCATENATE 'https://sap.medavie.bluecross.ca' lv_url+ls_match_result-offset INTO lv_url. WHEN OTHERS. ENDCASE.
CONCATENATE lv_url '?action=y&username=' ls_user-username '&uuid=' lv_uuid INTO ls_line. APPEND ls_line TO lt_body.
CLEAR ls_line. APPEND ls_line TO lt_body.
CLEAR ls_line. MESSAGE s010(zbc_reset_password) INTO ls_line. * If you did not request this, you can ignore this message. APPEND ls_line TO lt_body.
CLEAR ls_line. APPEND ls_line TO lt_body.
CLEAR ls_line. MESSAGE s011(zbc_reset_password) INTO ls_line. * This is a computer-generated email. Please do not reply to this email. APPEND ls_line TO lt_body.
MESSAGE s006(zbc_reset_password) INTO lv_subject. * Password Reset Request
lv_receiver = ls_adr6-smtp_addr. lv_sender = 'pfmatthews@aol.com'. lo_componentcontroller->send_email_to_user( EXPORTING im_t_body = lt_body im_v_receiver = lv_receiver im_v_sender = lv_sender im_v_subject = lv_subject IMPORTING ex_send_result = lv_send_result ).
wd_this->fire_to_confirmation_plg( ). ELSE. MESSAGE e005(zbc_reset_password) INTO lv_message_text. * Invalid email address!
* report message CALL METHOD lo_message_manager->report_error_message EXPORTING message_text = lv_message_text RECEIVING message_id = lv_msgid. ENDIF. ELSE. CLEAR lv_message_text. MESSAGE e005(zbc_reset_password) INTO lv_message_text. * Invalid email address!
CALL METHOD lo_message_manager->report_error_message EXPORTING message_text = lv_message_text RECEIVING message_id = lv_msgid.
ENDIF. ELSE.
* report message CLEAR lv_message_text. MESSAGE e004(zbc_reset_password) INTO lv_message_text. * Invalid user!
CALL METHOD lo_message_manager->report_error_message EXPORTING message_text = lv_message_text RECEIVING message_id = lv_msgid.
ENDIF. ENDIF.
ENDMETHOD.

method WDDOBEFOREACTION . * data lo_api_controller type ref to if_wd_view_controller. * data lo_action type ref to if_wd_action.
* lo_api_controller = wd_this->wd_get_api( ). * lo_action = lo_api_controller->get_current_action( ).
* if lo_action is bound. * case lo_action->name. * when '...'.
* endcase. * endif. endmethod.
